in.teramatrix.flint.driver.controller

Class NotificationReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.controller.NotificationReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    okhttp3.Callback

    public class NotificationReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
implements okhttp3.Callback
    This receiver will be invoked when device receives any push notification for new ticket from firebase service and user clicks on "Details" or "Declined" action. In both case, first application will be opened and some operation will be performed. In this version, By clicking on "Details" Button, user can view ticket/task details. So application will be started and OpenTicketFragment will be loaded on MainActivity. On the other hand, If user clicks on "Declined" button, An api to update task status will be called. This api will be called in background.
    Since:
    Version 1.0
    Author:
    mohsin.khan
    Date:
    5 Jan 2017
